member.name: E:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Events.EditorEventDispatcher.OnFirstEditorStartup
member.summary: Invoked during the first Editor startup of the day.

member.name: E:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Events.EditorEventDispatcher.OnEditorCrashed
member.summary: Invoked on Editor startup if the Editor crashed or did not close properly.

member.name: M:VisualDesignCafe.Editor.Events.EditorEventDispatcher.IsFirstStartupOfTheDay(System.DateTime@)
member.summary: Returns true if the current day changed compared to the day that the editor was previously started and if more than 4 hours have passed as well.
